      This creates a stockorder, the stockorder is where the current amounts of stock need to be reorderd determined by if the quantity is less than currently set reorderPoints.

    • Method Detail

      • showInventory

        public java.lang.String[] showInventory(int i)
        This function shows the latest inventory found by using the parameter argument int i. This is passed through from the GUI "SuperMarket" class and returns a String[] Array
        Parameters:
        i - int i to pick which object
        Returns:
        String[] String[] Array returned

      • getObjectAmount

        public int getObjectAmount()
        This returns the current inventory total (size()). This is used In the GUI to sort through the ShowInventory(int counter) function
        Returns:
        objectNameSize.size() returns the current inventory size

      • initialise

        public void initialise(java.io.File inventProp)
        This function is fed the inventProp and is used to initialise the supermarket with its items set to the quantity values of 0.
        Parameters:
        inventProp - used to create the objects

      • stockOrder

        public void stockOrder()
        This creates a stockorder, the stockorder is where the current amounts of stock need to be reorderd determined by if the quantity is less than currently set reorderPoints.

      • manifestDelivered

        public void manifestDelivered(java.io.File delManifest)
        The Created Manifest is selected by user in the GUI and is used as a parameter to use openManifest(file) in Manifest.Manifest. After this takes the stored Parameters in the instanced class StoreItems.java and uses them to find the costs to the company for the manifest delivery
        Parameters:
        delManifest - Loading the Created Manifest

      • salesLog

        public void salesLog(java.io.File salesLog)
        This is used to read the saleslog.csv's. The .csv is passed as an argumnent which is fed through to manifest then CSVParse respectively. After the values stored from other classes are used to find the total profit the company made over the sales period.
        Parameters:
        salesLog - The SalesLog.csv to read
